meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kimberley Stephenson Dan Burke Blythe Rodgers Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6422.

td.p: Kimberley Stephenson, a college librarian from Pasadena, California
Dan Burke, a high school theology teacher from Chicago, Illinois
Blythe Rodgers, an attorney from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,999)

tr.td: CHEMICAL ELEMENTS
THINK FAST!
HISTOR"E"
SMART WORDS
ROUGH REVIEWS ON Rotten Tomatoes
A DOLLAR IS WORTH ABOUT...

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Atomic number 17, it\'s poisonous, smells bad & causes irritation to the nose, lungs & throat; put some in my pool, please!')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Atomic number 17, it's poisonous, smells bad & causes irritation to the nose, lungs & throat; put some in my pool, please!
